channel.title: How could I send discord web hooks?
channel.description: So how could I send webhooks to discord, when someone logs in or registers. I have developer plan.

item.title: How could I send discord web hooks?
item.dc:creator: OverDrive
item.description:
You would need to set the webhook in your dashboard, and then use the KeyAuthApp.log(“log reason here”); feature
